room_title: Escape room "Dr. Watson’s Infirmary" by The Great Escape Room in Tampa
review: We escaped from Dr. Watsons Infirmary and it was a blast! This is a great team building event! Q is hilarious and adds fun to the room! We enjoyed you Q!

room_title: Escape room "Dr. Watson’s Infirmary" by The Great Escape Room in Tampa
review: The great escape room was so much fun, and Q was the best surgical assistant ever! Highly recommend doing this with nine people you know and love to have fun with! Will totally be back again!

room_title: Escape room "Dr. Watson’s Infirmary" by The Great Escape Room in Tampa
review: Great experience at The Great Escape Room the Dr. Watson's Infirmary. We are veteran escapees and have done many rooms around the area and this was one of the more challenging rooms. The tech and design were top notch and we had a great facilitator in Faith, she was awesome (highly recommended). Will definitly be going back to attempt some of their other rooms soon!

room_title: Escape room "Dr. Watson’s Infirmary" by The Great Escape Room in Tampa
review: Q was awesome!!!! This place is awesome!! The infirmary was an awesome room to try and figure out. We will be back.

room_title: Escape room "Dr. Watson’s Infirmary" by The Great Escape Room in Tampa
review: My family and I went on 5/25/17 to celebrate my birthday. It was so much fun! It's challenging and exciting! We would definitely go back. The infirmary beat us but we'll be back! Harley was amazing!
